TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TrackingRecord extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 、 和 是衍生自此 基底類別。

span.span: The base class from which , , and are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程執行個體在它的執行期間會向執行階段追蹤基礎結構發出三種追蹤事件：活動狀態事件、使用者事件和工作流程狀態事件。During its execution, a workflow instance emits three kinds of tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure: activity status events, user events, and workflow status events. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會嘗試比對這些事件和 中的追蹤點。The runtime tracking infrastructure tries to match these events with track points in a . 每當執行階段追蹤基礎結構符合追蹤點時，它會傳送追蹤記錄至追蹤服務，記錄中將包含與追蹤點和追蹤事件關聯的資料。Whenever the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record that contains data associated with both the track point and the tracking event to the tracking service. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構可以傳送三種追蹤記錄：、 和 。There are three kinds of tracking record that the runtime tracking infrastructure can send: an , a , and a . 每一種追蹤記錄都衍生自 類別，並對應執行階段追蹤基礎結構可比對的三種追蹤點的其中一種：、 或 。Each kind of tracking record derives from the class and corresponds to one of the three kinds of track point that the runtime tracking infrastructure can match: an , a , or a .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得與追蹤點關聯的附註集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.

value.span: ，其中包含此 所對應之追蹤點關聯的附註。

span.span: A that contains the annotations associated with the track point to which this corresponds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定附註與 中的 、 或 產生關聯。You can specify annotations to be associated with an , a or a in a . 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會儲存這些附註，而且當它符合追蹤點時，會在 中傳回附註。The runtime tracking infrastructure stores these annotations, and, when it matches the track point, it returns them in .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定與導致傳送追蹤記錄的追蹤事件關聯的事件資料 (如果有的話)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.

value.span: ，代表與導致傳送追蹤記錄的追蹤事件關聯的事件資料 (如果有的話)。

span.span: An that represents the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行個體發出的特定種類追蹤事件會有與之關聯的事件資料。Certain kinds of tracking events emitted by a workflow instance have event data associated with them. 如果追蹤事件有與它關聯的事件資料，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會將事件資料放入衍生類別的 屬性中。If a tracking event has event data associated with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure puts the event data in property of the derived class. 例如，工作流程執行個體終止時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會傳送 ，其中 會設定為包含終止原因相關資訊的 。For example, when a workflow instance is terminated, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a with set to a that contains information about the reason for the termination.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定與追蹤記錄關聯之追蹤事件的日期和時間。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the time and date of the tracking event associated with the tracking record.

value.span: ，表示追蹤事件發生的日期和時間。

span.span: A that indicates the date and time that the tracking event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。The is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定值，這個值表示與追蹤記錄關聯的追蹤事件相對於工作流程執行個體發出的其他追蹤事件的順序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates the order of the tracking event associated with the tracking record relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.

value.span: 表示追蹤事件相對於工作流程執行個體發出之其他追蹤事件的順序值。

span.span: A value that indicates the order of the tracking event relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示工作流程執行個體內的追蹤事件相對順序。 indicates the relative order of the tracking event within the workflow instance. 在工作流程執行個體中將是唯一的，但不保證循序。 will be unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
